website_summaries.verdict: A full 100 feet of recycled, non-waxed paper that can be embellished in lots of ways.
pros: Lots of imaginative uses for good old brown paper, tied up with string
Doubles up as mailing paper wrap
Thicker, higher quality than butcher paper
Eco-friendly and made in the USA
cons: May not hold water-based paints well

customer_reviews.title: Buy butcher paper instead!
customer_reviews.text: This paper worked well. But since I'm packing for a move, I ran out of it. I headed to Smart n Final looking to see if they sold something something similar. They sell a 1000 (one thousand!) feet roll of white butcher paper for $20 that is perfect for wrapping things in. I'm still packing and that $20, 1,000 foot roll is still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to describe the weight or maybe you call it the thickness of the paper. I was hoping this would be about the same thickness as cheap copy paper. It is slightly thinner than that though. I am using it for wrapping paper so it will still suit my purposes. If you are using it for art paper, it is probably too thin for water-based paints but still ok for ink stamping projects.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must to have handy at home!!
customer_reviews.text: This year we decided to keep it very uniform and maintains the rustic look to our home decoration.. we decided on wrapping paper that made our home theme complete! The Kraft paper is very strong and sturdy and able to handle heavy and even the delicate gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paper for packing delicate items
customer_reviews.text: I use this packing paper as a combination of protection and aesthetic wrapping for my hand-made pottery. The quality of the paper is very good, and you get a decent amount for the price. My customers and people to whom I've given pottery as gifts have commented that they appreciate that I use 100% recycled paper, and that it also looks nice (sure beats giving them pottery wrapped in old newspaper!) The paper is thick and not translucent at all, with a thickness and durability comparable to (but a little lighter weight than) paper grocery sacks. It takes tape, inked stamps, and stickers well. I would recommend this paper for both gift-wrap or for insulation of delicate items in transport.
customer_reviews.author: Keara

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! I use this paper to wrap all my presents (except for Christmas). A huge money savings over store-bought wrapping paper. Then I look for fancy ribbon on sale (many stores sell the ends of rolls at reduced prices), and it really pops against the brown paper. The gift looks very classy. This 18" roll is the perfect size, too!
customer_reviews.author: Esther D. Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Role
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as simple wrapping paper for Christmas gifts. I really enjoy decorating my own wrapping paper, and it's cheaper to do so anyways. Some pros: -The paper is great--thick and sturdy, but bendable enough so that it doesn't rip when you try to fold up the corners. -Miles long. I'm going to be using this for a while Con: -A narrow role--not wide enough to wrap the 23" monitor screen I bought for my boyfriend. If you're only using it to wrap smaller gifts, then it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: M Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafts and wrapping!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to start a new tradition with my young family. I wrapped all our presents to other family members and had my kiddies decorate them with stamps. The paper held up beautifully! I was afraid my little ones would poke thru it in some places but it stood the test! I even put embossing powder and a heat gun on it! The paper is both durable yet easy to fold! I am very satisfied and can’t wait to continue this tradition!
customer_reviews.author: Torey

customer_reviews.title: Light and strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the use of postal paper; for wrapping boxes. It covered a standard USPS medium flat rate box (11.25”x8”x6”) in one peice. The paper didn’t tear easily, held on the corners. I would like a heavier duty paper for shipping, but it still worked perfectly for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this paper to make a tree on the wall for the church nursery. Great quality paper doesn't rip or fall down. the roll seemed small but it was enough to do my whole job. Looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: celesteskycop

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Pleased
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I got these to wrap our holiday/birthday/miscellaneous gifts, and we're pretty pleased with our purchase. I'm sure I just didn't read the dimensions correctly, but the roll is much shorter than I imagined. I thought it would be somewhat similar to a roll of wrapping paper, but it's only about 1/2 that length. I don't regret my purchase at all, but I figured that's something people should be aware of!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to wrap gifts. It is perfect for basic size boxes. I was able to wrap all of my Christmas gifts in this. It works for boxes up to the sweater/coat size boxes. If it is narrow you can wrap larger boxes easily. It’s thick enough, yet it is easy to fold for gift wrapping. It accepts tape well and the tape doesn’t come off. I love it and i haven’t even used half of it after the Christmas holiday gift wrapping and about 20 birthdays, so it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: b-Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great paper
customer_reviews.text: I use this both for crafts and to put under the cat litter box and under the bird cage. I absolutely love it because, unlike most rolls. it stays pretty much flat when I need to use it. Nothing worse than trying to flatten out some of that rolled paper. The thickness is also pretty good too. I will certainly be buying this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bazinett

customer_reviews.title: A-mazing
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo many uses. I originally ordered this to help template for a cosplay costume for my daughters Halloween costume. I then used it to keep the copious amount of hot glue off my work bench, made giant paper air planes, wrapped a gift for a buddy of mine (because who has wrapping paper that isn’t holiday oriented) , A real life panoramic coloring book for the kids and finished the day off with using it to edge where I was painting. I can’t say enough good things. Fast shipping. The whole experience was top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S

customer_reviews.title: Not good as wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be versatile gift wrap/art paper. It is fine as art paper, easy to tear, good for paint. It is not good as wrapping paper. For starters it is way overpriced for the meager amount you get. Second it’s much too short of a roll to wrap anything substantial. Lastly it is not thick so be careful on corners, they bust right through. I’d skip this altogether and get finger painting paper for crafts and actual wrapping post for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jennhuiz

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: This paper is incredibly durable and there is so much for such a great price. This is the best wrapping paper I’ve ever used! It’s thick and I didn’t accidentally rip it while wrapping. It’s so much better than paying $5 for a tiny roll of paper to run out and have to buy four more. To make it pretty we drew on it with sharpies and it didn’t soak through and we also used decorative ties.
customer_reviews.author: Tianna Roman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everything--including wrapping!
customer_reviews.text: To make life more simple, I had the idea of using kraft butcher paper for all our gifts. This roll is perfect for that! It's thick where it's not see through, but not so thick that it's impossible to fold, crease, tape, and use for wrapping. Since having it, we've used it for so many other things like wrapping up packages for the mail, using it as padding inside packages, and even over tables at parties! We will definitely be buying more rolls of this in the future! It's our new staple in the household. Now I just need to get a paper cutter for it to rest inside for even easier cutting and access.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes great gift wrap!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an inexpensive way to wrap gifts for all occasions (rather than buying one roll for birthdays, one for weddings, one for Christmas, etc.) in something classy not tacky. It works SUPER well, is very high quality - durable and thick, but still versatile enough to wrap things in. Note: IT IS **NOT** the size of normal wrapping paper - it is only about half the length. It doesn't really affect what I'm using it for, but keep that in mind in case you plan to use it for larger/longer items.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paper to use as a table runner. It was very easy to use, cut and fold. I also used pieces for kids to color on and they enjoyed it. Very versatile item. The paper is extremely think and durable, which was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vela

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavyweight paper - packaged well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for some crafting and table cover and it was just think - the paper is heavyweight and lasted well on the tables even with a bunch of teens. We were able to do the crafts with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: ❤️ ATX

customer_reviews.title: Very thick paper
customer_reviews.text: We used this recycled craft paper to line the cage for our guinea pig. It was a bit too thick, but the price was right. I ordered another thinner paper in sheets on Amazon and it works much better for what we needed it for. I suppose if you mail packages via snail mail, this product would be perfect. Not so much for what we used it for. No fault of the product. It is thick and a nice size, but I won't reorder for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Cwissy

customer_reviews.title: Cannot go wrong with recycled
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so that I can from now on, wrap my gifts in recycled paper!! My most recent gift was for a baby shower and the mother complimented my paper more than anyone’s and it was the brown recycled paper! Why spend the extra money when you can make something look great yet simple
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality at a fair price! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I received my roll of paper the next day, after I ordered! I use it for shipping through the USPS. It saves me money when I send first class packages, because it does not add much weight to packages that already have a box, but it keeps them from getting scuffed up. This is top quality paper and is easy to wrap a package with. This paper is perfect, fairly priced and ships out fast! I also like the fact, that it is made from recycled paper. Just as advertised! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Gets creativity juices flowing!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice weight paper for wrapping gifts! Folds nicely and is sturdy but not too thick to make gift wrapping cumbersome. Nice to decorate with rubber stamping so you can design your own paper as shown on one of my pics. with butterfly stamps & copper embossing powder. The largest gift I wrapped is 9"x15"x8.5".That's about the largest size this roll will handle without having to piece together. Nice quantity & good quality!
customer_reviews.author: K. Czygan

customer_reviews.title: Nice chorehorse roll of paper!
customer_reviews.text: I got it to cover a box that I need to ship and discovered other uses for it since it is a quality heavy duty paper! Using a doubled piece as a blotter on my husband's desk. He is the world's worst at leaving some kind of beverage stain/rings on the desk since he can't grasp the concept of coasters. Dropped a doubled piece lined in between with paper towels.... into the boot mat by my front door to wick water from my barn boots. It works great for craft project...both as spill protection on the table under the project and as great paper for drawing stencils on. I'm sure I'll be finding more ways to make it a multitasker!!
customer_reviews.author: OverRoverTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it too!
customer_reviews.text: Indeed, this is a product with multiple uses! We buy it for our cats. Just tear off ten or so feet, crumple it up a bit toss in a few toys and they happily bounce and tumble around in it. Also good at Christmas, remember the song about favorite things, ‘brown paper packages tied up with string? You can make a display of boxes on something like an old sled. Also probably good for packing material.
customer_reviews.author: BridgetG

customer_reviews.title: Simply Great...Loving it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product with incredibly fast delivery and I found the company friendly and helpful! I'm sure this roll will last FOREVER and is truly one of the best purchases I have ever made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Riz

customer_reviews.title: Used for a food table
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for a wedding shower, we used it to place on the table underneath food. Be sure you want to place the food in that space, because it will show grease or watermarks on the paper. (it is paper after all) We placed decorative greenery down the center of the table with stands holding cupcakes, sandwiches and such. Then laid sliced lunchmeat, cubes of cheese, nuts, chips, pretzels, pickles etc down the way. Turned out perfect! Will do again in January for a birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: lilsistoo

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: My kids started to use crayons and pencils... and they as “beginner” tend to draw anywhere and everywhere. So... I bought this paper craft mainly to wrap around a small table I have set for my kids when they are using the crayons and pencil. I change it once they destroy the paper or there is no more space to draw. Definitely life saver and can last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: DinoBerryCake

customer_reviews.title: Great look. Wish it was wider.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to decorate for a party and it worked great! The paper was nice and sturdy and looked good. It did require several pieces of tape to keep it up but I was expecting that. Also I do with it we’re wider so that when I was covering a wall it didn’t take quite so many layers but of course that is in the description. Just check the measurements before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Fresh Outlook

customer_reviews.title: Great for shipping gifts
customer_reviews.text: This really makes shipping gifts easy. I don’t have to necessarily put a box inside another box. Great for multi occasions. I love to decorate with stickers and have paints I use to personalize the gift wrapping. I think this is thicker than most wrapping paper. The roll is easy to slide paper out. Taped up well, but not too tough to cut or tear for unwrapping. Cuts down on the amount of gift wrapping rolls I have around.
customer_reviews.author: Christine K. Cornett-McVay

customer_reviews.title: A Durable and Useful Item For Shipping out large and irregular shaped  packages
customer_reviews.text: A Durable and Useful Item For Shipping out large and irregular shaped packages. With a wrap of USPS bubble wrap underneath, this wrapping paper is easily layered over an irregular shape package (like my guitar in guitar case) and then packing tape was covered over the seams, creating a relatively good solution for my shipment upon an online sale to a customer. Also, the price and quantity is just about right!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Spinner

customer_reviews.title: right size
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. Believe it or not I am using it in my genealogy research. I wanted a roll of paper that I could tape to the wall and put down info and have several lengths beside each other to compare information. It is where I can look at it on a regular basis and see trends, movements of people in areas with the hopes of narrowing down who certain ancestors are. This roll of paper fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: pema drolma

customer_reviews.title: Great to wrap boxes for shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love having this for my small business. I can not only wrap items, but I can also wrap boxes and slap a shipping label on it, so it looks “less boxy.” I’ve been very pleased with the quality, and it doesn’t take up as much space in my home as I expected, so my little designated shipping supply area isn’t crowded. Very nice item.
customer_reviews.author: H. Alan

customer_reviews.title: I like the roll it is not so big and bulky
customer_reviews.text: We just did a birthday package for our grandson in the marines and it has to be shipped and the paper is heavy enough so it will hold everything together not like birthday and Christmas paper which are very thin we are going to do more packages and we both like the smaller roll to work with I mean height wise the last roll we used was 3 foot high nice paper Thanks Pete
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Avoid using as wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this for wrapping christmas gifts but it is very thin and the roll is short. I can almost see right through it and can only wrap small gifts with it because it's half the length of a small roll of wrapping paper. Calling it a jumbo roll is false advertising, in my opinion. It would be good for covering school books like we used to do back in the day or as a catch cloth for arts and crafts. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Gift Wrap
customer_reviews.text: After a very long search and a ton of wasted money..... I have finally found the gift wrap paper I've been searching for! Shop no further! This is it! Perfect weight and texture for gift wrapping. I will definitely be ordering this paper again. I received the paper in excellent condition and super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Honesty

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift wrap & Sketching paper!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Woodman Kraft Paper as all-occasion wrapping paper with money being tight right now due to COVID. I used it for anniversary and graduation gifts with ribbon around it and I didn't expect to but I got a ton of compliments at the simple wrapping. My nephew is a sketch artist trying to increase the size of his portraits so he is now using it for portrait drawing and he loves it. He used it to sketch ideas for a mural and the mural came out beautifully. Thanks Woodman Crafts! I'll be a recurring customer!
customer_reviews.author: ARH

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift wrapping smaller items.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to do my Christmas wrapping this year, great paper. Lighter weight that other Kraft paper I had which will make it easier to wrap and tape up gifts . The only down side is it's not as wide as I had hoped, but I guess that my fault since it clearly states the dimensions in the listing. I would maybe prefer a longer paper, I have had to use multiple sheets for some pretty regular size boxes to get full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kraft paper
customer_reviews.text: This paper is really nice quality and suitable for various purposes. The weight of the paper is heavy enough to wrap items without tearing, but not so heavy that it’s difficult to work with. The paper is nice and smooth as well so you can use it for drawing and art projects. A perfect all-around Kraft paper.
customer_reviews.author: Browncoats Unite!Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Not for gift wrapping
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I are looking for a more environmentally friendly wrapping paper so we don’t have to give up our tradition of wrapping presents. This is not it. About half as tall as regular wrapping paper and tape does not stick to it very well. Seems like it’s good quality for other uses though
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: The paper roll is short in width than other wrapping paper rolls. But this somehow manages to cover every part. Make me wonder about how much waste of wrapping paper i have wasted cutting extra pieces i don't need. Needless to say i will be re-ordering this again. I love the thickness, the color, how easy it is to use. However, this is definitely for wrapping gifts, not moving boxes of that sort.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. I’m highly satisfied. I used this for wrapping paper, and to make a large sign for a birthday. The paper is sturdy, folds great, and doesn’t tear easily. I used chalk markers for my designs and they stuck to the paper and really popped!
customer_reviews.author: Nah

customer_reviews.title: Did what it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for wrapping paper for some birthday gifts. It's very thick & sturdy, made for easy coloring as that's why I chose this. It's smaller than I thought, but that's my fault for not reading the dimensions. Nothing another layer couldn't fix. I'm satisfied in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christinaz Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Great, thrifty wrapping paper alternative
customer_reviews.text: I bought one roll of this and was able to wrap all of our presents (for 3 kids) and still have 1/3 left. That would have cost at least $30 in traditional wrapping paper which is absurd. I also bought twine and gift tags, all was still less than regular wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Cruse-Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting tables when crafting, painting, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I sent this for my Grandhoneys to use for crafts & protecting table surface. My younger ones like me to cover the table ( I use painter’s tape to hold it in place under the table top), then they draw, color, and/or paint all over it. They think it’s so cool🙂
customer_reviews.author: Kae

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for wrapping gifts for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: I've used this to wrap kids's gifts as well as adult gifts, and it is perfect (durable, but not too thick). I use Washi tape to make it look more interesting. For the kids's gifts my kid can draw/color on the wrapping. The size of this is also perfect for wrapping. When I opened the box I was surprised how short the roll was, but this is actually better for wrapping most gifts (100% of the four gifts I've wrapped so far).
customer_reviews.author: Rainer Maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality, Pretty, Not That Wide
customer_reviews.text: I wrapped all my Christmas gifts with this this year! I love the amount that comes in the roll, and it looked really pretty under the tree! If you are looking to buy this for gift-wrapping, it's not great for large presents, unless you want to use more than one layer of paper. But, measurements are provided on the product page, so that was my fault for not reading it closer. :) It is pretty sturdy, but it did tear a little when I bunched it together on both ends (in wrapping something to look like a piece of candy).
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Heidel

customer_reviews.title: worked great and went with the western theme
customer_reviews.text: I used this handy roll of paper to cover all of the tables at a BBQ; worked great and went with the western theme.
customer_reviews.author: Schellbear

customer_reviews.title: I'm floored!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my floors. Little thin, it tore easier than others have..when wet, so I had to buy twice as much. However I recognize I did use it for floors and not crafts so I'm going to sit it some slack! Aren't my floors pretty!?
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Jae

customer_reviews.title: Great Paper
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We used it to wrap Hanukkah gifts and draw doodles on the paper as decoration. It also worked great as packing material and wrapping fragile items for when we moved to a new home.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Economical
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to wrap early Christmas gifts. I decorated with ribbon and tags. It was both economical, practical and looked great. Wrapping large toys was easy because there was no pattern to match. Good choice and I would recommend this product to friends and use this form of wrapping in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Negri

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Have been using to wrap everything from collectibles to glass items for shipping. So far, I am very pleased with the quality. It is very sturdy and durable - in fact, I liked my first order so much, I just re-ordered! Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jodi A. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gifts and crafts
customer_reviews.text: We got this for wrapping gifts and we love it. You cannot see through it but it is not too thick either. And since we definitely won’t use it all for the holidays, it will double as a nice craft page for the kids to color on
customer_reviews.author: Hoodschwinked

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for wrapping and crafting
customer_reviews.text: Note that this is a little shorter than a standard wrapping paper roll, so you may have to get creative with say, a standard shirt box. Great for wrapping gifts, covering surfaces for crafting, and general kid art stuff.
customer_reviews.author: kirby

customer_reviews.title: I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to wrap custom tie dye sets that I make for my small business. it’s worked very well so far for the first few orders! I wrap it then ship it inside a mailer bag so I don’t use the wrap solely for packaging but it’s still very sturdy and easy to use. truly great quantity and quality for the price of this product!
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Thick, versatile paper. I use it for everything
customer_reviews.text: This is thick, versatile paper. I use it for anything from wrapping gifts to covering packages I mail. I holds marker well & doesn't bleed through when I use paint or paint markers to decorate. Also, it's the ultimate size to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this paper for shipping my Holiday boxes for my customers. However, the paper is not as thick as I thought it would be. I’m going to use it for drawing and other crafts with my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for regular, non recyclable wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.text: Great for more vintage wrapping, or anything really. I like that you can actually recycle this, rather than wrapping paper. It's not as wasteful. And great for reusing boxes. It comes with quite a bit on the roll so I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hobby paper
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I'm spray painting, painting or anything with my hobbies. Just so that my kitchen island or workbench doesn't get paint. Can't go wrong with this. I've used it for packing paper, and for my daughter to paint on. Always have an extra roll for projects.
customer_reviews.author: Andy0811

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This roll of paper is just what we need. The paper is a perfect thickness. Roll arrived in fine condition. One suggestion I'd make with regard to packaging is to wrap the roll in plastic or perhaps an outer wrap of paper to protect the roll . But that is a minor thing - paper is great.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I’m needing it Different reasons I’m using it to line the bottom of my reptile tank for easy cleanup and it is the perfect size absolutely love it great deal gonna work just perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was longer
customer_reviews.text: I used it for wrapping Christmas presents this year, it was pretty good and held up great while folding. I just wish it was slightly wider because some clothing boxes couldn’t be wrapped properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Double check that you don’t mind the size!
customer_reviews.text: Nice eco friendly option. Only thing I want to say is double check that you like the size. I assumed that it was “normal” wrapping paper size but it’s actually smaller. Just means you have to get creative when wrapping larger objects.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes less fuss is better...natural paper is beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something more natural in gift wrapping and found it!!! Maybe not fancy but I love the look and I wrapped all my granddaughters birthday gifts with beautiful ribbons showing the contrast and it’s perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Not wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.text: Not wrapping paper!! Bought this for Christmas presents and its half the width of a normal wrapping paper. Guess I shoild have read more closely but they should not advertise this as wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.author: Kamala mccune

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could wrap my x-mas presents with it. I got a cricut maker as an early x-mas gift, and I wanted plain paper I could decorate. This has been easy to fold and wrap, even my odd shape presents with. Very impressed and will definitely order again! One down fall, is I did think the roll was a tad bigger. So far though it has worked perfect for my gifts :) Very pleased with the feel, look, and quality!
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great liner paper.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised and in good condition. I ordered to line our counter for when I eat crabs. It works for this purpose and great to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.text: i use this to wrap art commissions before shipping them out. tied up with some natural string, it looks great! the folds held well, and it held up nicely during the folding process, and shipping. love that it's eco-friendly as well.
customer_reviews.author: shayshayface

customer_reviews.title: What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Though I have not used the paper yet, it will do the job. I use it to back my framed watercolors and the 17" height is perfect for 16"x20" frames without the waste. Thank you for making my after-painting work easier. You can see my work on my website josephescalia.com
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Scalia, Author; Artist

customer_reviews.title: Crafty Rustic Presents!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I went with the idea to do a rustic and beautiful theme to my Christmas wrapping this year..I go everything I needed here at Amazon to make the perfectly wrapped presents!! Will do this from now on
customer_reviews.author: kathleen maggipinto

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: It’s not sturdy and easy to break. The paper is not of high quality and I find it quite disappointing. Not worth my money. It’s easy to fold though.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky T.

customer_reviews.title: Will work great for gift wrapping, crafts etc
customer_reviews.text: I plan to use this as wrapping paper, and embellish. Just wish I had ordered a wider width. Will not accommodate larger boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Using it to wrap gifts in an 'old' aesthetic. Just what I needed! Sturdy enough to not tear easily but not too thick to make it difficult to use for wrapping. The fact that it is recycled paper makes it all the better. Awesome amount of quantity for the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a roll for a wedding shower I was hosting at my house. I thought it would be cute to line the counter-tops of my kitchen under the food. Then I would write which item it was and decorate it. I ended up using it to cover my dining table instead and it was perfect. I also was able to entertain the kids by ripping off a long sheet and grabbing the markers and they had a ball coloring.
customer_reviews.author: kellyk

customer_reviews.title: Good prices
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good price for the wrapping paper. You can make your own designs. Kids have a fun time creating their cute drawing. You can use stamps or stickers
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. A little thinner than I thought it would be. A little hard to open, but once cut into it, was easy in general to cut to wrap presents with.
customer_reviews.author: Tyla

customer_reviews.title: Narrow roll
customer_reviews.text: Good thickness, but purchased as wrapping paper and did not realize this is a narrow roll. Did not fit most of the boxes I wanted to wrap. My fault for not paying attention to the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: sk8soccermom

customer_reviews.title: Not Related to Kraft Cheese
customer_reviews.text: TBH, i though i was buying Kraft Brank cheese paper. You know, like the sort of paper the weirdo at the deli puts between slices of tangy swiss, making sure that you have more trash than you really need. I ended up using this to pack glassware, which was ok, but DO NOT use it to separate cheese slices, that...was a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Used for Raised Garden Beds
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Used to line new raised garden beds as an alternative to weed barrier and because I didn’t have extra cradboard (draws earthworms up for decomposition and it’s a healthier alternative to chemicals for where I’m growing veggies for my family). Shipped very quickly and nicely packaged. And love that it’s made right here in the USA. Will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Packaging needs to change
customer_reviews.text: Great until you have to take off the wrapper sticker. It wastes your product. Took off a star because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my gift wrapping this year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paper to do my gift wrapping this year. I didn't want to spend the money on wrapping paper and I like the rustic look it gives to the presents
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product I have used this on my table for Thanksgiving and my kids have used it to write on and have fun. Very versatile and sturdy paper.
customer_reviews.author: Stefmav1

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it had been twice as long. I should have noticed that. But the paper will be used. I like usin the paper year round and going all out with decorating the bows etc.
customer_reviews.author: SharletteWhite

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: I loved wrapping my Christmas presents in this paper...I got many compliments and they looked so nice under the tree...I will purchase again...
customer_reviews.author: Bonnye

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I had in mind.
customer_reviews.text: This Christmas, I used this paper to wrap all of my presents; this plus an elaborate bow made for beautiful presents. I found it durable & easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Exacly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I used this paper for a charcuterie board, it took my entire counter. It worked perfectly. I could write on it to let everyone know what they were eating, or not eating. As well, it held up to the meats, cheeses, fruits, and nuts nicely. And when the party was over, rolled it up and threw it away. I love that I will be able to use it to wrap gifts in it when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Neckole Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Craft away your fears
customer_reviews.text: Yes! I will definitely buy this regularly for my crafting needs. It definitely does the job!
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for many uses!
customer_reviews.text: Great option perfect for many uses! I needed this for a flower project for Mother’s Day and I have actually also used it for other crafts around the house even gift wrapping. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Thick enough to cover and fold yet flexible and manageable ...even single  handed
customer_reviews.text: Covering boxes, mailing supplies, school crafts, pattern making.....I am going to look at additional rolls in wider widths. Handy product. Good service. Got it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect thickness
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a party to keep counters clean and wrote descriptions of food items. Used for wrapping paper too. Worked great and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great for creating your masterpieces!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and excellent seller. Paper is great for painting with watercolors and ink drawings. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Recomend this product. Easy on folding. Is strong paper. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Babygirl65

customer_reviews.title: Craft paper
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I wanted but it’ll work. Got to wrap presents and it does alright for that. Figured if it didn’t work for wrapping paper it’s be great for crafts (crayons or pencils because it’ll suck the life out of markers).
customer_reviews.author: Stormyy

customer_reviews.title: Great for wrapping
customer_reviews.text: The only downside I've noticed with this is it is a little too sensitive to folds and creases really easily. I wrapped a lot of my Christmas presents with it, added some white splatter paint, and turned my presents into little works of art. Have enough left over for next year too!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Russell

customer_reviews.title: the best wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Used this to wrap so many gifts the past holiday season and there's still a lot left. It's great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Peffley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The roll is small so make sure you pay attention to the measurements. It's good for wrapping small gifts. Its thinner than I expected, which is good bc it makes wrapping easy. There is A LOT of paper on the roll so what is left over from wrapping will become coloring paper for kids.
customer_reviews.author: B.Little

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We needed this for school thanksgiving party. We put it over the tables with crayons so the kids could draw on it. Worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a cheap option to wrap up 40 shoe boxes to give as gifts to my students and this was perfect. Great feel, looks good, and it's a steal for how big the roll is. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gigel2000

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought for multi purpose use and the size was smaller than expected but its such a huge roll that it made up for the length
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality paper. You get a lot of meterían for proce. It worked perfectly for what I needed. I’d recolmend.
customer_reviews.author: Angie L.
